method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initializes the fields to their default value.

field.name: IsInitialized
field.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: _destroy
method.comment: Destroy's UltimateWebViewAssetLoader. After that you can pass Null to UltimateWebViewAssetLoader variable.

method.name: _getassetpahturl
method.comment: Gets the URL prefix for load file from DirAsset.

method.name: _getdomain
method.comment: Gets or sets the UltimateWebViewAssetLoader domain.

method.name: _getinternalpahturl
method.comment: Gets the URL prefix for load file from DirInternal.

method.name: _getresourcespahturl
method.comment: Gets the URL prefix for load file from #AdditionalRes.

method.name: _getwebviewassetloader
method.comment: Gets the androidx.webkit.WebViewAssetLoader as Object which can be used as JavaObject, Reflector.Target or in inline java code.

method.name: _initialize
method.comment: Initializes the object. Domain As String - Set the domain for the UltimateWebViewAssetLoader. The domain can be of your choice or use e.g. Application.PackageName. The domain must be unique so that it does not match the domain of an already existing website. Pass Null or empty string to use default domain (appassets.androidplatform.net). Important: The UltimateWebViewAssetLoader will not work in DEBUG mode, work's only in RELEASE mode. Works from API 11 and higher.

method.name: _shouldinterceptrequest
method.comment: Call this method from shouldInterceptRequest method with predefined Url. Return result is Object as android.webkit.WebResourceResponse. Pass this Object as return value for shouldInterceptRequest event or use it's parameters to construct custom WebResourceResponse.

method.name: _shouldinterceptrequest2
method.comment: Call this method from shouldInterceptRequest method with predefined android.net.Uri. Return result is Object as android.webkit.WebResourceResponse. Pass this Object as return value for shouldInterceptRequest event or use it's parameters to construct custom WebResourceResponse.

property.name: _assetpahturl
property.comment: Gets the URL prefix for load file from DirAsset.

property.name: _domain
property.comment: Gets or sets the UltimateWebViewAssetLoader domain.

property.name: _internalpahturl
property.comment: Gets the URL prefix for load file from DirInternal.

property.name: _resourcespahturl
property.comment: Gets the URL prefix for load file from #AdditionalRes.

property.name: _webviewassetloader
property.comment: Gets the androidx.webkit.WebViewAssetLoader as Object which can be used as JavaObject, Reflector.Target or in inline java code.
